title: Can not launch LoL
body: Whenever i launch lol launcher, and press `LAUNCH` in never opens me the log-in window. I tried restarting computer and tried over and over again many times but it wont work. Can someone help please

replies.body: The patcher needs permissions to launch, scan files, or provide updates.  A setting with your OS might be blocking that from happening.  As a first step, I suggest following the instructions in our [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide.  This should get you fixed up!
Thanks but reinstalling the game worked out, thanks anyway

Yes having the same issues, cant even launch my normal client, and when I try my alpha client it tells me there is no internet connection. 

I just wanna talk with my friends :/
Still, no one has solution for the problem?? I am now trying to reinstall league
